radiographic_examinations.findings: Subtle angioid streak in the left eye and drusen-like bodies in both fundi.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable ocular findings; no skin lesions; and no visual, cardiovascular, or gastrointestinal symptoms at follow-up examination 13 years later.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Histologic findings of PXE including calcification, fragmentation, and clumping of elastic fibers in the mid and deep dermis.
Histologic examination revealed calcification and fragmentation of elastic fibers in the mid dermis.
